constraints: FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customers(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES orders(id) ON DELETE CASCADE
FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT
FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories(id) ON DELETE SET NULL
FOREIGN KEY (address_id) REFERENCES addresses(id) ON DELETE SET NULL

Return Data.dependency_graph:
Level 0: categories, addresses
Level 1: products, customers
Level 2: orders
Level 3: order_items

Dependencies:
- products depends on categories
- customers depends on addresses
- orders depends on customers
- order_items depends on orders, products
